titleStmt.title: The Grand problem briefly discussed, or, Considerations on the true mature and limits of obedience and submission to governours with respect to the different forms of an absolute and limited monarchy / by a divine of the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: Divine of the Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Mercer and sold by Randal Taylor,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary, New York.
